output: The Palm Treo 750 features a TFT resistive touchscreen display with 65K colors and has a size of 2.5 inches. It runs on Microsoft Windows Mobile 5.0 PocketPC operating system and is powered by a 300 MHz Samsung CPU. The device includes a 1.3 MP camera that also supports video recording, and it comes with a removable Li-Ion 1200 mAh battery that provides up to 200 hours of stand-by time and up to 4 hours and 30 minutes of talk time. It has a QWERTY keyboard, supports miniSD cards up to 2 GB, and includes Bluetooth 1.2 connectivity with A2DP support. The phone is available in black and weighs 154 grams, measuring 111 x 58 x 22 mm.
